text: U.S. Cremonese (Unione Sportiva Cremonese) is a football club from Cremona, Lombardy, which plays in the Serie A. The team will play in the Serie A because it was promoted in the 2021â€“22 Serie B season. ==Current squad== ==Coaching staff== Position Name Head Coach Massimiliano Alvini Assistant Coach Antonio Porta Goalkeeper Coach Ferdinando Coppola Fitness Coach Marco Antonio Ferrone Physiotherapist Andrea Gualteri Carlo Bentivoglio Alessandro Rivetti Kinetotherapist Cristian Freghieri Chief Doctor Diego Giuliani Club Doctor Fabrizio Frittoli Video Analyst Igor Quaia == References == Category:Italian football clubs Category:Cremona Category:1900s establishments in Italy Category:1903 establishments in Europe
